summary: REQ-2 and REQ-3 appear implemented: a /facts route is added to the TanStack Router (lazy-loaded) and "Facts" navigation links are added to both desktop and mobile nav (mobile closes on click). REQ-1 is only partially evidenced because the FactsPage render output is truncated; the diff shows a facts array and shadcn Card imports but does not clearly show an H1 and a bulleted/numbered list being rendered with the intended styling.

missing_requirements.requirement: Facts page renders a clear H1 title and a numbered or bulleted list of human urine facts with Card-based styling consistent with the Tips page.
missing_requirements.reason: FactsPage.tsx content is truncated before showing the JSX render. The diff only evidences the facts array and Card imports, not the required H1/title and list rendering/styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced extensive unrelated feature descriptions (moderation hooks, attachment video support, reaction bar, age acknowledgement gate, styling/theme changes, etc.) in the frontend summary file.
hallucinated_features.reason: These features are not requested by the BuildRequest (which is limited to adding a static Facts page, routing, and navigation). The only concrete change evidenced is that the summary file content includes these unrelated additions.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state metadata updated to include additional feature request tracking entries not required to deliver the Facts page feature.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not require updating project_state.json; this appears to be process/metadata work outside the requested implementation.
